Hi, I just finished my PhD in mathematics at EPFL Lausanne. Currently, I am looking for a new challenge for future. My main areas of expertise includes

  • Hyperbolic conservation laws
  • Radial basis functions
  • Scientific programming

I am interested in the application of mathematical and computational methods to challenging problems from physics and engineering.
